title: lee sin
body: does anyone know how much will cost GOD FIST LEE SIN and if this skin will available forever ??

replies.body: Alas, I don't really have info on new stuff until it's been released.  Things may also change over time while it's still being tested on the PBE, so I couldn't really say for sure.  Your best bet would be to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on the release and price.  Hang tight for now!
